title: Nicolle Wallace & Whoopi Goldberg
description:
After a successful career in politics, Nicolle Wallace joined The View in 2014. She and co-host Whoopi Goldberg, who are still close friends today, discuss the impact co-hosting for one season had on her career, her relationship with fellow co-host at the time Rosie O’Donnell, and the advice show creator Barbara Walters gave her after she left The View.
Listen to "The View" weekdays on your favorite podcast app! Just search for "The View" on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you like to listen. For more: https://abcaudio.com/podcasts/the-view
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
